title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, the ultimate educational tool for young minds! With 25 guided STEM experiment lessons, this kit offers an immersive and hands-on learning experience for children in grades 3-6, ages 8 and up. 

The 48-page color student guide provides step-by-step instructions, ensuring an easy and enjoyable learning process. Plus, the Parents' Choice Silver Award guarantees its high quality and effectiveness in promoting educational growth.

This science kit features an electric motor with transparent plastic, allowing children to witness the fascinating inner workings of this essential device. With battery-powered motor operation, young scientists can explore the principles of motion and electricity. But the learning doesn't stop there! The kit is also reconfigurable into a hand-crank electric generator, providing a comprehensive understanding of energy conversion.

One of the key highlights of this science kit is the opportunity to delve into the exploration of magnetic fields and electric currents. Through engaging experiments, children can unlock the mysteries of magnetism and build simple circuits to observe firsthand the wonders of electricity.

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is not only educational but also designed to be entertaining. It encourages children to play and learn simultaneously, fostering a love for science and discovery.

With its dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, this kit is compact and lightweight, weighing only 1.3 pounds. It is the perfect companion for at-home learning or classroom settings.

Invest in your child's future and ignite their passion for STEM with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit. Order now and watch as they embark on an exciting journey of scientific exploration!

This kit's dimensions, measuring 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, make it compact and easily stored. With a weight of just 1.3 pounds, it's also portable, allowing your child to take their scientific adventures wherever they go.

Invest in the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today and provide your child with an exceptional learning experience.
